## Properties

| Property              | Attribute         | Description                                                  | Type               | Default     |
| --------------------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------ | ----------- |
| `columns`             | --                | Array of column definitions                                  | `TableColumn[]`    | `[]`        |
| `data`                | --                | Array of data rows                                           | `TableRow[]`       | `[]`        |
| `initialColumnWidths` | --                | Initial column widths (can be used for resize functionality) | `number \| string` | `undefined` |
| `reorderColumns`      | `reorder-columns` | Whether column reordering is enabled                         | `boolean`          | `false`     |
